title: LF Support Duo
body:
I've just come back from working overseas and I'm gonna be on holiday for a long ass time.

LF gold +3 Support 
Working Mic
Positive attitude

I'm a pretty laidback person and I've been playing ADC since season 3 - Looking to reach diamond sometime next month. Currently gold 2, doing placement games right now. Let me know if you are interested add  "A Marksman" I'm on everyday from 12:00pm-11:30pm

replies.body: I sent you a friend request, silver 2 currently. Was Gold 2 in season 7!
